name: Hisense 55" QD6 Series QLED 4K UHD Smart Fire TV (55QD6QF, 2025 Model)
key_specs: Game Mode Plus with VRR & ALLM
pros: Exceptional value, offering QLED and Dolby Vision at a very low price
Excellent picture quality with vibrant colors and deep blacks
Comprehensive gaming features including VRR and ALLM
Surprisingly good Dolby Atmos sound for a budget TV
Integrated Fire TV with Alexa is user-friendly
cons: Mixed reports on reliability; some units stop working
Performance and menu navigation can be slow
Motion Rate 120 indicates a 60Hz native panel (motion is enhanced)
Build quality reflects the budget nature of the TV
